title: Cozy Single Room Near University
description: A small yet comfortable room ideal for students. Comes with a bed, desk, and chair.

title: Spacious Apartment for Sharing
description: A well-furnished apartment with multiple rooms available for sharing.

title: Studio Apartment (No Windows)
description: A compact studio with all basic facilities but lacks natural light.

title: Luxury Penthouse with Rooftop View
description: An expensive but spacious penthouse with a private terrace and breathtaking views.

title: Old Dorm Room (Needs Repairs)
description: A cheap option for students on a budget. The room has minor issues with plumbing and electricity.
address: Room 302, Building 10, Ain Shams University Dorms

title: Shared Room with Three Beds
description: A large room shared between three students, fully furnished.

title: Underground Bunker Room
description: A weird but secure room located underground, ideal for those who love silence.

title: Overpriced Tiny Room
description: A very small room, barely fitting a bed, with an unrealistic price.
address: Downtown Cairo, near Talaat Harb Square

title: Mansion with 10 Rooms (Too Expensive for Students)
description: A massive villa that is clearly out of budget but still listed for students.
